snippet: Israeli forces fired warning shots from the ground and the air, and then carried out an airstrike in Gaza against a squad that had fired a rocket at Israeli soldiers, according to military officials.
abstract: One Israeli soldier and a Palestinian militant are killed in an exchange of fire after the militant breached the fence along the Gaza-Israel border.
lead_paragraph: Israeli forces fired warning shots from the ground and the air, and then carried out an airstrike in Gaza against a squad that had fired a rocket at Israeli soldiers, according to military officials.
